text:
Pronouns : She / Her
Maneesha Papireddygari maneesha.papireddygari@colorado.edu papireddygari.github.io/
Research Interests
Algorithmic Economics , Automated Market Makers , Wagering Mechanism , Blockchain Economics ,
Decentralized Finance , Online Learning Algorithms , Information Elicitation and Aggregation
Education
2020-2025 PhD , Computer Science , University of Colorado Boulder , Boulder .
Research Advisor : Prof. Bo Waggoner
2018 - 2020 Master of Arts , Economics , Delhi School of Economics , ( DSE ) , Delhi .
Research Advisor : Prof. Abhijit Banerji
-

Technology ( IIIT ) Hyderabad , India .
Project Advisor : Prof. Rajan K.S.

ongoing
